name: Pumpkin Planner 2021
description:
Do you keep messing up your pumpkin every year? Have you ever felt like your pumpkin would have looked better if only you had the chance to practice? Well, have no fear! With Pumpkin Planner 2021, you'll be able to practice in a safe virtual environment surrounded by the calming sounds and atmosphere of autumn. Sit down, get out your knife, and start carving!

Controls :

Use the marker/eraser to plan your design. The marker can be used on the outside shell of the pumpkin and will glow when placed under blacklight. Use the carving tools to shape your pumpkin. Each tool digs a little deeper than the previous tool.

Use the recycling sign to restart your design. There is no undo button.
Use the note to change the volume of music/SFX. Use the moon/sun to switch between night and day. Use the camera to save an image of your pumpkin in your Documents folder.

Once you're happy with the design of your pumpkin, use the candle toggle to illuminate your pumpkin. Use the blacklight toggle to show the spooky maker lines you've left behind. Make sure to share the result with your friends!

Credits :

All art and coding by R.Adam
Main music is "On Rainy Days (Piano)" by Zight
